traits.name: Goal-Oriented
traits.action: Set and track project milestones using SMM’s progress tracker to showcase ambition.

traits.name: Strength
traits.description: Enhances mental resilience for tight deadlines.
traits.action: Lead a high-pressure media project to demonstrate fortitude.

traits.name: Accurate
traits.description: Ensures precision in editing or design work.
traits.action: Deliver a flawless content edit to highlight accuracy.

traits.name: Logical Reasoning
traits.action: Apply logical reasoning to organize a complex storyline in a project.

traits.name: Spatially Aware
traits.action: Create a compelling layout in Adobe Illustrator to display spatial skills.

traits.name: Dexterity
traits.description: Improves precision in video editing or illustration.
traits.action: Produce a detailed digital illustration to showcase dexterity.

traits.name: Athletic
traits.action: Maintain a fitness routine to sustain energy during media productions.

traits.name: Melodic
traits.action: Record a captivating voiceover to demonstrate vocal skills.

traits.name: Artistic Sensitivity
traits.description: Elevates aesthetic quality of media content.
traits.action: Design a visually stunning media piece to showcase artistic judgment.

traits.name: Creativity
traits.action: Pitch a novel media concept in a team meeting to highlight creativity.

traits.name: Observational
traits.action: Share observational insights in a documentary or journalism project.

traits.name: Problem-Solving
traits.action: Lead a solution for a production issue to showcase problem-solving.

traits.name: Decision-Making
traits.action: Make strategic decisions in a media project to demonstrate capability.

traits.action: Develop a content strategy plan to highlight planning skills.

traits.name: Critical Thinking
traits.action: Critique a media piece in a team discussion to showcase critical thinking.

traits.name: Communication
traits.action: Deliver a compelling project pitch to showcase communication skills.

traits.name: Teamwork

traits.name: Leadership
traits.action: Direct a media production to show leadership.

traits.name: Negotiation

traits.name: Drive
traits.action: Pursue a challenging media goal to showcase drive.

traits.name: Growth Mindset
traits.action: Share insights from a new media course in a team meeting.

traits.name: Resilience
traits.action: Share strategies for overcoming project setbacks in a team discussion.

traits.name: Self-Efficacy
traits.action: Present a confident creative proposal to demonstrate self-efficacy.

traits.name: Intrinsic Motivation
traits.action: Share personal motivations in a creative team discussion to inspire others.

traits.name: Adaptability

traits.action: Adopt a new content creation tool to show flexibility.

traits.name: Time Management

traits.name: Proactiveness

traits.name: Design Thinking

traits.name: Emotional Expression
